price: They will wish to get out of the Fire, but they will never get out of it, and for them there will be an everlasting punishment.
arabic: يُرِيدُونَ أَن يَخۡرُجُواْ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ وَمَا هُم بِخَٰرِجِينَ مِنۡهَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
